Element.description: a horizontal bar with a knob which appears at the bottom of a container, such as a frame
a component user can click to trigger a function (e.g. Save) or make selection (e.g. OK/Yes)
a component for selection. Grouped checkboxes enables multiple selection
a component that combines a button and a drop-down list
a top-level window with a title and a border
a text component that appears on a screen
list out all available selections in rows, and allow the selection of values in it
a thin horizontal bar at the top of a frame for users to access primary functions
a container for lightweight components
a component that allows the entering of password. Value is masked with asterisks
a horizontal bar that indicates progress, based on the filled portion
a component for single selection
a horizontal or vertical bar for splitting components in a UI component
a thin bar with a knob on it for value adjustment through dragging
a component that combines a text box and two tiny up and down buttons for entering/selecting value
add tab(s) to the edge of another component, like a panel
to display and edit regular two-dimensional tables of cells
a component that allows the editing of multiple lines of text
a component that allows the editing of a single line of text
a component user can press and unpress to enable and disable certain function
a component that displays a set of hierarchical data as an outline
a vertical bar with a knob which appears on the right in a container, such as a frame
